data.actual_result: Nothing, the emoji appears as if it was sent
data.expected_result: The emoji should turn red or something to indicate it wasn't sent
data.short_description: Emoji only DM to user that disabled DMs from server doesn't show as failed
data.steps_to_repro: - Get a user to disable messages from members on server - Ensure you have no other mutuals and that you aren't friends - Send emoji to the user via DM
